definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

sentences.english: A dual-channel instantaneous soil radon measurement instrument based on the method of electrostatic collection is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计一套基于静电收集法的双道瞬时土壤测氡仪。

sentences.english: There was a significant decrease in the subjects' pretest and post-test scores of attitude and motivation.
sentences.chinese: 学生的英语学习态度和动机前后测分数有显著降低。

sentences.english: Total serum testosterone was assayed by Chemoluminescence immunoassay.
sentences.chinese: 化学发光免疫分析法测血清总睾酮。

sentences.english: The application of Michelson interference principle in measuring small displacement is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍迈克尔逊干涉仪原理在测微小位移中的应用。

sentences.english: Acoustic correlation velocity measurement technology is used to make measurements of velocity relative to the seabed.
sentences.chinese: 声相关测速技术可以测得舰船相对于海底的绝对速度。

sentences.english: The measurement of the mechanical property of the materials used in hydraulic models is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了水工模型材料力学性质的量测问题。

sentences.english: A geodesic dome is a round building made of many straight-sided pieces.
sentences.chinese: 测地线拱顶是一个全面建设的许多直幅片面。

sentences.english: The metric is a value that measures the desirability of a route.
sentences.chinese: 权值是量测一个路由的可取性的值。

sentences.english: Occupational radiation dose was detected by TLD dose meter.
sentences.chinese: 职业外照射剂量，采用TLD剂量计测得。

sentences.english: This study employs the experimental designing mode of the experiment-group and the control-group before and after experiment training.
sentences.chinese: 本研究采用了实验组与控制组前后测实验设计模式。

sentences.english: It is shown that values computed by conventional formula are largely deviated from the measured data.
sentences.chinese: 试验表明，过去的计算值与实际测得数据相差太大。

sentences.english: Continuous streamflow is measured at about 150 locations.
sentences.chinese: 大约150个地方在测持续流量。

sentences.english: Because arc length of trajectory is regarded as the variant in geodesics based method, it .
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于测地线的机器人轨迹规划方法。

sentences.english: I had a test of my eyesight yesterday and I have got more near-sighted.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天测了视力，我近视得更厉害了。

sentences.english: The membrane was also titrated with AAP by measuring the intrinsic fluorescence of protein.
sentences.chinese: 用AAP滴定红细胞膜，测蛋白质自身荧光变化。

sentences.english: The hydrometric pendulum is sometimes used to determine flow velocities in open channels.
sentences.chinese: 测流速的摆锤有时用于确定明渠中的流速。

definition: to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
to take measurements/measured (speed etc)/observed (as opposed to "estimated")/observational (astronomy)
